membership:
The seven Public Service Broadcasters in the five Nordic countries DR,NRK,RUV,SVT,SR,UR and Yle are all members of the European Broadcasting Union, EBU. 
 
EIF: European Internet Forum
goals__remit: The overall mission and objective of Nordic PSB is to safeguard and promote the interests of the Nordic public service broadcasters in relation to European affairs and regulations. To strengthen the position of public service broadcasting in the Nordic countries and Europe. Nordic PSB closely follows the work and activities in the different institutions of the European Union and The Council of Europe dealing with the audiovisual sector.
